title: RLC 1v1 Championship Opening Week (20th September)
body:
Hey guys, hyped to be announcing that we will be bringing back the RLC 1v1 league for the third time!

The RLC III will have players battling it out 1V1 on the Howling Abyss over a period of 8 weeks for the chance to be recognised as one of OCE's finest. 
If you'd like to learn how the RLC works, you can visit this link: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1ag5IXo7LFKaEpm9OP4INSqfH9k5sGYRzBD1oJQugCyw/edit?usp=sharing

Event Prizing
1st: 4150RP + 100AUD + permanent emote/role in Discord
2nd: 3450RP
3rd: 2750RP
4th: 2050RP
5th-8th: 1350RP
9th-16th: 650RP
(RP increases depending on players)

The opening week will take place this Friday at 6PM AEST and will run through until the 15th of November. 
You can join in by heading to this link: https://battlefy.com/risen/rlc-iii-1v1-league-opening-week/5d6fb72f46083b6e6bafdda3/info?infoTab=details
You can join our community here: https://discord.gg/vaJUyx4

See you on the Rift!
